CarouselDisplayItems.captionContent: You can ask whatever you want

CardDisplayitems.title: Natural Language Processing
CardDisplayitems.text: Natural Language Processing is the key to detect what you actually want to ask

CardDisplayitems.title: Wikipedia

CardDisplayitems.title: A.I.
